entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @VP @Mike_Pence 

COVID-19 continues to spike in more than 20 states -- you haven't slowed it a bit -- none of you give a damn about how many Americans are dying -- Trump wants to slow down tests so he can play politics with dead people ...
